clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Quality of Life and Survival With MS-20 in Patient With Advanced Hepatocellular Carcinoma (FDA IND 74572)
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase II Randomized, Controlled Study to Evaluate the Quality of Life, Survival and Therapeutic Benefits of MS-20 in Patient With Advanced Hepatocellular Carcinoma

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate Quality of Life (QoL) score of MS-20 versus placebo in advanced HCC patients using European Organization for Research and Treatment of Cancer (EORTC) QLQ C-30 questionnaire.

primary_outcome.measure: To evaluate Quality of Life (QoL) score of MS-20 versus placebo in advanced HCC patients

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall survival, Overall survival rate, Change from baseline of the highest weight observed, Change from baseline of body weight

clinical_study.keyword: microbio, MS-20, Hepatoma, Advanced Hepatocellular Carcinoma
